# Neuro Thrive Foundation

> Empowering neurodivergent youth and adults through adaptive fitness, wellness, and community.

## About

Neuro Thrive Foundation is a nonprofit organization dedicated to advancing health, wellness, and independent living skills for neurodivergent individuals, including those with autism spectrum disorder and related conditions. We use evidence-based fitness, nutrition, and behavior-focused education to bridge health disparities and promote equal participation.

## Mission

To advance the health, wellness, and independent living skills of neurodivergent youth and adults using evidence-based fitness, nutrition, and behavior-focused education. We deliver direct services, specialized caregiver and professional training, and inclusive community wellness initiatives.

## Vision

Full access to wellness, meaningful social connection, and opportunity for all.

## Core Values

- **Inclusion**: Everyone belongs
- **Evidence-Based Practice**: Every routine matters
- **Empowerment**: Every achievement counts
- **Health Equity**: Bridging disparities in wellness access
- **Community**: Building supportive connections

## Programs & Services

### Adaptive Fitness Programs
Small-group classes and 1:1 coaching designed for neurodivergent individuals. Focus areas include:
- Strength training
- Coordination development
- Self-regulation skills
- Independence building

### Nutrition & Healthy Living
Sensory-friendly nutrition education including:
- Interactive meal planning sessions
- Safe cooking skills training
- Nutrition education tailored to neurodivergent learning styles

### Wellness Education
Comprehensive wellness workshops covering:
- Movement and executive functioning connection
- Sleep hygiene
- Personal hygiene routines
- Time management skills
- ACT-informed wellness coaching

### Community Wellness Initiatives
Inclusive programs including:
- Community outings
- Seasonal camps
- Weekend "Healthy Habits Club"
- Partner-led public events

## For Families & Caregivers

We provide specialized training and resources for families:
- Caregiver workshops on exercise, nutrition, sleep, and hygiene support
- Behavior-based strategies for increasing independence
- ACT-driven motivation guidance
- Resource guides and instructional videos
- Referral lists and peer network access

## For Professionals

Training and resources for fitness coaches, ABA professionals, educators, healthcare providers, and agencies:
- Adaptive fitness workshops
- Sensory-friendly coaching certification
- Inclusive practice training
- Best-practice tools and research summaries

## Contact Information

Website: https://neurothrivefoundation.org
Email: info@neurothrivefoundation.org

## Key Topics This Organization Can Help With

- Adaptive fitness for autism
- Neurodivergent wellness programs
- Sensory-friendly exercise programs
- ABA-informed fitness coaching
- Nutrition for special needs
- Independent living skills training
- Caregiver wellness support
- Professional development for autism support
- Inclusive community fitness
- Evidence-based wellness interventions

## Accessibility Commitment

Neuro Thrive Foundation is committed to physical, cognitive, and communication access—online and in-person—through sensory-considerate design. Our programs actively incorporate feedback from the neurodivergent community.
